en: Today is the day of the school fete.
Peppa loves coming to the fete.
Candy Cat, Suzy Sheep,Danny Dog, Rebecca Rabbit and Pedro Pony.
zh: 小猫凯迪，小羊苏茜，小狗丹尼，小兔瑞贝卡和小马佩德罗。

en: Me, too! What do you like best?
zh: 我也是！你最喜欢玩什么呢？

en: I like the bouncy castle the best!
zh: 我最喜欢那个冲气城堡了！

en: George, what do you like best?
zh: 乔治，你最喜欢玩什么呢？

en: Oh, dear, there aren't any dinosaurs at the fete, George.
zh: 哦，天啊，乔治，游园会里没有恐龙的。

en: Maybe we can get you a dinosaur balloon.
zh: 也许我们可以找个恐龙气球。

en: Are you sure they have dinosaur balloons,Daddy Pig?
zh: 你确定他们有恐龙气球，猪爸爸？

en: Can George and I get our faces painted first?
zh: 乔治和我能先去在脸上画画吗？

en: Miss Rabbit has painted Peppa's friends as tigers!
zh: 兔小姐把佩奇的朋友都画成了老虎！

en: Now you look like a tiger!
zh: 现在你看起来像只老虎！

en: Wow! I like your face, Suzy.
Peppa, would you like your face painted?
zh: 佩奇，你想在脸上画画吗？

en: Yes, please. Can I be an elephant?
Oh, dear, I don't know how to do elephants.
zh: 哦，天啊，我不知道怎么画大象。

en: There you are, Peppa, now you're a tiger!
zh: 好了，佩奇，现在你是一只老虎了！

en: George, what would you like to be?
A dinosaur? Er, how about a tiger instead?
zh: 恐龙？呃，改画一只老虎，怎样？

en: Candy, please, can you teach us how to be tigers?
zh: 凯迪，你能教我们怎么扮做老虎吗？

en: Okay! Tigers creep very very slowly,
zh: 好的！老虎走得非常非常地慢，

en: Tigers like to lick themselves clean.
zh: 老虎喜欢把自己舔干净。

en: But, best of all, when tigers are happy they purr.
zh: 但是，最棒的是，当老虎高兴了他们会发出咕噜声。

en: And I'm teaching them to be proper tigers.
zh: 我还在教他们怎么做一只老虎。

en: What do you little tigers want to do next?
zh: 那接下来你们这些小老虎们想做什么呢？

en: That's right! We have to find George a dinosaur balloon!
zh: 说得对！我们得帮乔治找个恐龙气球！
你们每个都会得到气球的！

en: Certainly! I've got lots of different ones.
zh: 当然可以！我有很多不同的气球。

en: Can I have an elephant balloon? Please!
zh: 我能要一个大象气球吗？
我能要一个袋鼠气球吗？

en: Most important of all, We need a dinosaur balloon for George.
zh: 最重要的是，我们要给乔治一个恐龙气球。

en: Oh, dear, I do not seem to have any dinosaur balloons.
zh: 哦，天啊，我好像没有恐龙气球。

en: Don't worry, George. I've got an idea.
Could we have two of the long balloons, please?
What is Daddy Pig doing with the balloons?
zh: 猪爸爸打算怎样摆弄气球呢？

en: There! Can anyone guess what it is?
zh: 好了！大家能猜猜这是什么？

en: Daddy Pig has made a balloon dinosaur.
zh: 猪爸爸做了一只恐龙气球。

en: Peppa loves bouncing on the bouncy castle.
zh: 佩奇喜欢在冲气城堡上玩！

en: Everyone loves bouncing on the bouncy castle!
zh: 大家都喜欢在冲气城堡上玩！

en: This is the best school fete, ever!
zh: 这是最棒的学校游园会了！
